item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0194; 05:06AM; 5020 W Obama Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w1Wsn6; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 66 firefighters extinguished the fire in 29 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the attic. The fire was contained primarily to the unit of origin with two additional units sustaining minor extension inside (from the fire on the exterior) and one with damage only to the exterior. Red Cross requested to assist displaced (number unknown) residents. LAFD Arson is enroute for the investigation. No further details.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM22 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E266 E27 E294 E34 E43 E58 E94 EA1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA827 RA894 RA94 T26 T27 T29 T61 T66 T94 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0194; 04:57AM; 5020 W Obama Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w1Wsn6; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; Two story, garden-style apartment building with fire showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and are battling heavy fire in at least two units. Additional resources are enroute. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 4:36AM. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM22 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E266 E27 E294 E34 E43 E58 E94 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA827 RA894 RA94 T26 T27 T29 T61 T66 T94 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1835; 12:49AM; 6421 N Independence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N6y75w; #WoodlandHills; It took 74 firefighters 69 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1187; 06:00PM; 11798 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/38aohAJ; #HansenDam; It took 60 firefighters 2 hours and 10 minutes to contain the fire in heavy brush, holding it to approximately 15 acres. No injuries. No structures threatened/damaged. Crews will remain on scene for an extended period of time to ensure all hot spots are eliminated.
